page.title: 19FAWLEY PARISH COUNCIL.
page.content: This includes the designated area (pop.31,000). The council operates under the Local Government Act 1972, and meets in the Jubilee Hall, Fawley. There are 15 councillors elected every 4 years; Blackfield and Langley _ 6, Fawley and Calshot _ 4, Holbury and Hardley _ 5, and they serve on one of 4 committees. {Hall}_ all buildings available for public use.{ Parks and {open spaces}_ includes the recreation ground, Blackfield. {Public Services}_ matters concerning children's play equipment, footpaths, street lighting, bus shelters, seats. The chairman deals with{finance. Money required to meet expenses is obtained by precepts issued to New Forest District Council currently 2p rate (1p rate brings in Â£41,000), also interest on capital and income from use of facilities.
